author: cmpilato
msg: WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING
Plugging in the new commit system.  This change is simply growing too
large, and quite frankly, I could use some help finding all the fun
new bugs it introduces!  Known problems:
- client feedback is Not Quite Right(tm), but should suffice in the
short term for commits of working copies that do not have disjoint
- svn copy WC_PATH REPOS_URL is broken, and has been temporarily disabled.
- there are surely other problems with a change of this magnitude!
- there is still present quite alot of old code that will eventually
Though the code seems to generally work over ra_local and ra_dav, this
change *is* expected to break pretty much all of the commit-using
Python tests (since they depend almost exclusively on the feedback
from the client binary, which is, as was mentioned above, Not Quite
Right).  It is, however, *not* expected to break the XML tests.
(cleanup_commit): No longer call the non-existent close_func, and
beautify the rest of the code.
(svn_ra_local__get_commit_editor): No longer fetch and compose the
commit-track editor with the commit editor.
(handle_resource): No need to queue up resources that need bumping
until we get the target revision.  We aren't doing revision bumping
any more, so all we need are the version urls.
(commit_delete_entry): Behave appropriately given the new absence of
the 'deleted' member of the commit context.  Use add_valid_target.
(svn_ra_dav__get_commit_editor): No longer fetch and compose the
commit-track editor with the commit editor.
no need to be so secretive.  Add 'commit_items' parameter.
Comment out the temporary debug editor stuffs.
(svn_client__condense_commit_items): Error out if someone tries to
commit to a URL more than once in a single commit.
'wc_commit', and no longer do commit_item condensation.  Remove test
(svn_client_import): Copy old send_to_repos() contents here, pruning
(svn_client_commit): Copy old send_to_repos() contents here, pruning
Rename 'target' to 'path', remove 'baton', and update the docstring.
old svn_wc_process_committed was removed).  Update recursive call.
(revert_error): Reformat this, for crying out loud.
(get_wc_prop): Handle case where commit_items are present in baton.
(set_wc_prop): Handle case where commit_items are present in baton.
no need to be so secretive.  Rename 'repos_URL' to 'base_url'.  Add
Because of the way the new commit system works, we need to modify
the location of updates from XML commit files to the same relative
directory that was the anchor of the commit.
(svn_cl__import): Pass NULL as path to svn_cl__get_trace_commit_editor.
(svn_cl__commit): Pass NULL as path to svn_cl__get_trace_commit_editor.
